current_state: Siloed expertise in DevOps and Backend roles, creating single points of failure.
recommended_action: Schedule 4 hours per sprint for paired sessions: DevOps Lead to train Backend Lead on Terraform/CI-CD, and Backend Lead to train DevOps Lead on NestJS basics and API structure.
expected_benefit: Reduces key person dependency risk by 30%. Increases team's bus factor from 1 to 2 for critical skills.
success_metrics: Backend Lead can independently make minor changes to the CI/CD pipeline. DevOps Lead can debug basic API issues.
roi_calculation: Avoids potential project delays valued at over $20,000 per week.

current_state: Senior Frontend Lead is allocated to low-complexity UI tasks (e.g., TASK-US-053-01) that could be done by a Mid-level developer.
recommended_action: Re-assign standard component and form-building tasks from the FE Lead to the FE Developer. Reserve FE Lead's capacity for architecture, complex state management (Offline Sync), and mentoring.
expected_benefit: Frees up 10-15 hours of senior capacity per sprint for higher-value work, accelerating complex features and improving code quality through better oversight.
success_metrics: Increased velocity on critical frontend epics. Improved skill level of the Mid-level developer.
roi_calculation: Accelerates delivery of critical path features, potentially saving 1-2 weeks of project time.
